raw_body: HERFT – YVONNE MARVIS (nee WHITE) – 13.8.1931-15.8.2023. Beloved wife of Anselm (dec.),​ Beautiful and adored mother of Maxine,​ Daisy,​ Harold (dec.),​ Jack,​ Cedric and Tarnia,​ mother-in-law of Charlie (Revd: Charles Jansz),​ Christie (dec),​ Cleone,​ Yvonne,​ Dianne and Roderick. Memorable and much loved grandmother of Craig,​ Shannon,​ Amanda,​ Jared,​ Rebecca,​ Esther,​ Jadon and Kaine. Strong and kind matriarch of the family to children,​ grandchildren and great grandchildren,​ whose memory will live forever in their hearts. Was called Home on the 15th of August 2023. “… and I shall dwell in the house of the Lord forever….”052527
